summary: This document includes correspondence regarding the purchase of a helicopter (N722JE) by Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC from Hyperion Air, LLC. It outlines the terms of the purchase agreement, including amendments to the closing date and deposit requirements. This document contains various administrative inquiries related to aircraft registration and ownership, specifically focusing on N-numbers and associated records. It indicates that no records exist for certain N-numbers and provides details on the international registry for others. This document contains various communications related to the escrow process for the sale of a Sikorsky S-76C++ helicopter (N722JE) between Hyperion Air, LLC and Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC. It includes discussions about wire transfers, closing statements, and the necessary documentation for the transaction, including a delivery receipt and title insurance quotes.

events.title: Second Amendment to Aircraft Purchase Agreement

keyFacts: The helicopter N722JE is a 2008 Keystone (Sikorsky) model S-76C++ with a serial number of 760750.
Rich Munkvold is the Chief Financial Officer of Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC.
Darren Indyke is the authorized representative of Hyperion Air, LLC.
The purchase agreement includes a non-refundable deposit requirement of $200,000.
The closing date for the aircraft purchase was extended from May 7, 2021, to May 13, 2021.
The document includes inquiries into the ownership and registration of aircraft with specific N-numbers.
The document is subject to a protective order, limiting the disclosure of certain information.
Various administrative inquiries were conducted on 05/13/21 regarding aircraft documentation.
The helicopter involved in the transaction is a 2008 Sikorsky S-76C++ with serial number 760750 and registration number N722JE.
The total purchase price for the helicopter is $1,800,000.
An additional deposit of $100,000 was wired as good faith for the escrow process.
The closing date for the helicopter sale was extended to May 12, 2021.
Wire transfer instructions were provided for disbursements related to the sale.
